CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method = "xml"/>
<xsl:template match = "InScopeProtocol"> <xsl:variable name = 'docVerifDate' select = 'VerificationInfo/VerificationDate'/> <xsl:variable name = 'lastModDate' select = 'DateLastModified'/> <!-- Test data. <xsl:variable name = 'url' select = 'concat("cdrutil:/verification-date/", "2005-02-02/2005-02-03")'/> --> <xsl:variable name = 'url' select = 'concat("cdrutil:/verification-date/", $docVerifDate, "/", $lastModDate)'/> <xsl:variable name = 'verifDate' select = 'document($url)'/> <VerificationDate> <xsl:value-of select = '$verifDate'/> </VerificationDate> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
